name: Dragoon Collection
description:
The Dragoon Collection contains three games.

Dragooned is an action game with 40 playable characters of very different playstyles, with procedurally generated levels, endless onslaughts and other challenges.

2 RPGs - Skylight Freerange takes place in the Canadian Prairies in 2041, and Skylight Freerange 2: Gachduine in the Canadian Maritimes in 2048. Both RPGs contain multiple story paths and multiple ways to customize your characters.
